MediaAgent.name: generate_information
MediaAgent.description: The MediaAgent generates new information content to be disseminated to opinion leaders, initiating the information spread process.

output_updates.name: information_content
output_updates.description: The content of the new information generated by the media agent.

output_updates.name: target_opinion_leaders
output_updates.description: List of opinion leader agents targeted to receive the information.

OpinionLeaderAgent.name: filter_and_modify_information
OpinionLeaderAgent.description: OpinionLeaderAgent receives information from the MediaAgent, evaluates its credibility, and modifies it according to personal beliefs before sharing it with the public.

required_variables.name: information_content
required_variables.description: The content of the new information generated by the media agent.

required_variables.name: target_opinion_leaders
required_variables.description: List of opinion leader agents targeted to receive the information.

output_updates.name: original_information
output_updates.description: The original information received from the media agent.

output_updates.name: modified_information
output_updates.description: The modified version of the information after filtering by opinion leaders.

output_updates.name: opinion_leader_id
output_updates.description: Identifier of the opinion leader agent who modified the information.

output_updates.name: target_public_agents
output_updates.description: List of public agents targeted to receive the modified information.

PublicAgent.name: receive_information
PublicAgent.description: PublicAgent receives modified information from opinion leaders and reacts to it, completing the information dissemination process.

required_variables.name: modified_information
required_variables.description: The modified version of the information after filtering by opinion leaders.

required_variables.name: opinion_leader_id
required_variables.description: Identifier of the opinion leader agent who modified the information.

required_variables.name: target_public_agents
required_variables.description: List of public agents targeted to receive the modified information.

output_updates.name: received_information
output_updates.description: The information received by the public agent.

output_updates.name: public_agent_reaction
output_updates.description: The reaction or response of the public agent upon receiving the information.

output_updates.name: completion_status
output_updates.description: Status indicating the completion of the information dissemination process.
